text: @realDonaldTrump Your lack of empathy & leadership is breathtaking. Our people want to live first. Do you not understand there will be no economy if everyone is dying or sick & passing on #coronavirus? And not just seniors, as you don’t read reports, see the pic. (source: CDC/Business Insider). https://t.co/7grcxjGP1I
